definition: public/collectively owned/common/international (e.g. high seas, metric system, calendar)/make public/fair/just/Duke, highest of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/honorable (gentlemen)/father-in-law/male (animal)
to use/to employ/to have to/to eat or drink/expense or outlay/usefulness/hence/therefore
lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc
dialect/language/spoken words/speech/talk/words/conversation/what sb said/CL:種|种[zhong3],席[xi2],句[ju4],口[kou3],番[fan1]

sentences.english: The pay phone is in front of the bank.
sentences.chinese: 投幣式公用電話在銀行前面。

sentences.english: The public telephone has been vandalized.
sentences.chinese: 飯店大廳裏有一部公用電話。

sentences.english: The free public phone is about ten meters from the room to the right.
sentences.chinese: 免費公用電話就在出門口右拐，十米左右的地方。

sentences.english: Is there a public phone near here？
This system is applied to network management for booth in the city.
sentences.chinese: 該系統適用於城市公用電話自動計費器的網絡管理。

sentences.english: Can I make an overseas call through public phone?
sentences.chinese: 我可以用公用電話打國際長途嗎？

sentences.english: For example, the public-switched telephone network can only transport circuit-switched information.
sentences.chinese: 例如，公用電話網的電路交流的信息只能傳送。

sentences.english: Is there a pay phone nearby?
At some point, you probably stopped to wonder where all the pay phones had gone.
sentences.chinese: 有時候，你會停下來想，那些公用電話全都去哪啦？

sentences.english: There is a pay phone in the neighborhood.
sentences.chinese: 附近有一個投幣式公用電話。

sentences.english: She used a payphone to call 911 and report the incident.
sentences.chinese: 她用公用電話叫了911，報告了這起事故。

sentences.english: A man uses a payphone in the new business district.
sentences.chinese: 一個男人在新的商業區打公用電話。

sentences.english: In this paper a long-distance blood pressure measurement system by public telephone net is introduced.
sentences.chinese: 文中介紹基於公用電話網的遠程血壓監測系統。

sentences.english: He had to use this public telephone.
sentences.chinese: 他只得施用這部公用電話。

sentences.english: Some major stops also are equipped with public telephones.
sentences.chinese: 有的車站棚內還有公用電話。

definition: see 拔苗助長|拔苗助长[ba2 miao2 zhu4 zhang3]
to listen with respectful attention/(a polite request to sb to speak)/we are all ears
dichlorvos C4H7Cl2PO4, organic phosphate used as insecticide (loanword)/also called dimethyl dichloro-vinyl phosphate DDVP
to ask for trouble/to invite difficulties
